channel.title: Banner stance index
channel.description:
Well... I'm trying to fix the banner stance.. =s [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/dixthis.png[/img]
And I can't find the stance id... I've tried using stances from other weapons >_< Does anyone know a way to fix it or have the stance id?

item.title: Banner stance index
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:442680”]if you can find the attack id etc try the id’s near the attack/block id’s

it’s always near it[/quote]

Gah can’t find one that works with it >_<
I just don’t want it pointing backwards.

Read full topic
